message: I propose a 60-40 split in my favor to compensate for my inflation penalty. This is fair since your money won't lose value over time, while mine will.
My offer is more balanced, considering the inflation penalty you'll face in subsequent rounds. It's in your best interest to accept this proposal to maximize your value.
